channels: The channel to report summaries, sans the leading '#'
tz: Timezone for notification date/times. See http://momentjs.com/timezone for more details.
schedules: The day and times you want your team members to be notified each week

schedules.day: Must be a number representing the day of week. E.g. 0 (Sunday) or 6 (Saturday)
schedules.hour: Must be a number representing the hour of the day. Military time. 0-23
schedules.minute: Must be a number representing the minute of the hour. 0-59

doNotDisturbDates: The list of dates that you do not want your team to be notified. Note this overrides the schedules above.
doNotDisturbOverrideDates: Your team is working on a federal holiday and still want them to report status
questions: The set of questions that your team members will be asked. Note order is preserved
What did you work on yesterday?
What are you planning on working on today?
customConfirmationMessage: Once a team member finishes submitting responses, optionally insert a custom message

customConfirmationMessage.disabled: Whether or not to turn it off, defaults to false
customConfirmationMessage.isReplacement: Whether or not to replace the standard confirmation message. Defaults to false (meaning prepend the custom message to the standard message)
customConfirmationMessage.text: Don't forget to enter your :timer_clock: against tickets. This should be done daily.

members.color: A hexidecimal color that will identify each user's summary in the channel. Defaults to #FF530D if unset
members.disableReminderMessage: Disables status nag message per user. Defaults to false
